amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to enter into a contract with any person who has a demonstrated, recorded, or proven history of wage theft and is in violation of the Fair Labor Standards Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to enter into a contract with any person whose disclosures of a proceeding with a disposition listed in section 2313(c)(1) of title 41, U.S.C, in the Federal Awardee Performance and Integrity Information System.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A050) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A050) offered by Mr. Ellison.
